definition: Rear a tiger and court disaster. (idiom); fig. if you're too lenient with sb, he will damage you later/to cherish a snake in one's bosom
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: Well; I guess shewouls trying to play hard-to-get.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，大要想跟我玩“養虎遺患”的遊戲吧。
